Uses of Interface
org.seedstack.seed.security.api.principals.PrincipalProvider

  • Packages that use PrincipalProvider 
    Package Description
    org.seedstack.seed.security.api
    Provides classes for testing an application security.
    org.seedstack.seed.security.api.principals  
    org.seedstack.seed.security.ldap.api  

    • Uses of PrincipalProvider in org.seedstack.seed.security.api

      Methods in org.seedstack.seed.security.api that return PrincipalProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PrincipalProvider<?> SecuritySupport.getIdentityPrincipal()
      Gets the principal provider that holds the user's identity.
      PrincipalProvider<?> AuthenticationInfo.getIdentityPrincipal()
      Getter identityPrincipal
      Methods in org.seedstack.seed.security.api that return types with arguments of type PrincipalProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> SecuritySupport.getOtherPrincipals()
      Retrieves all the PrincipalProviders containing the user's details.
      Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> AuthenticationInfo.getOtherPrincipals()
      Getter otherPrincipals
      <T extends Serializable>
      Collection<PrincipalProvider<T>>      		 SecuritySupport.getPrincipalsByType(Class<T> principalClass)
      Gets all the PrincipalProviders corresponding to a type of PrincipalProvider.

      For example, you can use this method to get the LDAPUser by calling :
      getPrincipalsByType(LDAPUser.class).

      Then on the first element of the collection :
      LDAPUser user = ldapUserPrincipalProvider.getPrincipal().
      Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> PrincipalCustomizer.principalsToAdd(PrincipalProvider<?> identity, Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> realmPrincipals)
      Specifies the principals to add to the ones given by the realm.
      Methods in org.seedstack.seed.security.api with parameters of type PrincipalProvider

    • Uses of PrincipalProvider in org.seedstack.seed.security.api.principals

      Classes in org.seedstack.seed.security.api.principals that implement PrincipalProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimplePrincipalProvider
      A named principal represented as a string.
      class  X509CertificatePrincipalProvider
      Principal provider that stores the user X509Certificates used for his authentication.
      Methods in org.seedstack.seed.security.api.principals that return PrincipalProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Serializable>
      PrincipalProvider<T>      		 Principals.getOnePrincipalByType(Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> principalProviders, Class<T> principalClass)
      Gets one PrincipalProvider corresponding to a type of PrincipalProvider.

      For example, you can use this method to get the LDAPUser by calling :
      getOnePrincipalsByType(principals, LDAPUserPrincipalProvider.class) .

      Then :
      LDAPUser user = ldapUserPrincipalProvider.getPrincipal().
      Methods in org.seedstack.seed.security.api.principals that return types with arguments of type PrincipalProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Serializable>
      Collection<PrincipalProvider<T>>      		 Principals.getPrincipalsByType(Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> principalProviders, Class<T> principalClass)
      Gets all the PrincipalProviders corresponding to a type of PrincipalProvider in a collection.

      For example, you can use this method to get the LDAPUser by calling :
      getPrincipalsByType(principals, LDAPUserPrincipalProvider.class) .

      Then on the first element of the collection :
      LDAPUser user = ldapUserPrincipalProvider.getPrincipal().
